alert.note: Alert for Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:14AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA AND EAST CENTRAL WESTMORELAND COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM EDT... At 214 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending!** weakened. from 10 miles south of Punxsutawney to near Derry. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homer City, Blairsville, Black Lick, Clymer, New Florence, Seward, Bolivar, Cherry Tree, Armagh, Lucerne Mines, Commodore, Brush Vly, and Yellow Creek State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
